Package org.sakaiproject.user.impl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BasePreferencesService.Storage
    Storage
    BaseUserDirectoryService.Storage
    Storage
    UserServiceSql
    database methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationCache
    Because DAV clients do not understand the concept of secure sessions, a DAV user will end up asking Sakai to re-authenticate them for every action.
    AuthnCacheWatcher
    This observer watches for user.add and user.upd events to invalidate the Authn cache
    BasePreferencesService
    BasePreferencesService is a Sakai Preferences implementation.
    BaseUserDirectoryService
    BaseUserDirectoryService is a Sakai user directory services implementation.
    DbPreferencesService
    DbPreferencesService is an extension of the BasePreferencesService with database storage.
    DbUserService
    DbCachedUserService is an extension of the BaseUserService with a database storage backed up by an in-memory cache.
    OpenAuthnComponent
    A placeholder wide open Authentication - returns the password as the authentication user (UUID) id.
    PasswordService
    Service to check that a password matches and to generate encrypted passwords from plaintext.
    ReEncryptPasswords  
    UserAuthnComponent
    An Authentication component working with the UserDirectoryService.
    UserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationServiceImpl
    Service implementation to register email notification preferences
    UserServiceSqlDb2
    methods for accessing user data in a db2 database.
    UserServiceSqlDefault
    methods for accessing user data in a database.
    UserServiceSqlHSql
    methods for accessing user data in a hypersonic sql database.
    UserServiceSqlMsSql
    methods for accessing user data in an ms sql server database.
    UserServiceSqlMySql
    methods for accessing user data in a mysql database.
    UserServiceSqlOracle
    methods for accessing user data in an oracle database.
